description: Minimum NW width must be  >= 0.8um
Min space between two NW with different potential must be  >=  1.53 um
Min space between two NW with same potential must be  >=  0.8 um
Min width of an NW region not connect to most positive power supply must be  >= 1.784 um
Min area of NW must be  >= 4.0 um2
TO is not allowed to placed ,  if the space between two NW less than 0.96um
Min active width for interconnect must be  >= 0.186um
Active width for NMOS must be  >=  0.186 um
Active width for PMOS must be  >=  0.186 um
Min spacing of TO must be  >= 0.238um
Min extension from NW edge to an NW pick-up must be  >= 0.102um
Min spacing of NW edge to an N+active outside NW(5v) must be  >= 0.45um
Min spacing of NW edge to an P+active inside NW(5v) must be  >= 0.45um
Min spacing of NW edge to an P+active(PW pick-up)  outside NW must be  >= 0.102um
Min spacing of poly edge to the edeg of butted diffusion active must be  >= 0.272um
Min spacing of poly edge to the edeg of butted diffusion active must be  >= 0.272um
Min spacing of N+active to P+active for butted diffusion active must be  >= 0
One segment of the consecutive SN/SP edge of a butted  diffusion active should be longer than 0.326um
When NW and PW pick-up are put head-to-head across the boundary of the well ,  the spacing of N-pick-up to P-pick-up should be 0.304um in order to meet the implant rules
Min active area of a stand-along region must be  >= 0.2um2
Min active area of butted diffusion must be  >= 0.13um2
Length and width should be less than 60um
active not doped is not allowed
Min width for interconnects must be  >= 0.18um
Min width for gate of HVNMOS(5.0V) must be  >= 0.5um
Min width for gate of HVPMOS(5.0V) must be  >= 0.42um

Min spacing between two GT regions with contact on active area must be >= 0.318um
Min spacing between two GT regions without contact on active area must be >= 0.25um
Min extension of poly end cap must be  >= 0.186um
Min extension from active to GT must be  >= 0.27um
Min spacing of poly to active must be  >= 0.084um

1  Max length of salicide poly on SAB between two contacts must  <= 50um when poly width is less than or equal to 0.24um  2  Max length of salicide poly on SAB between one contact and poly line end must  <= 50um when poly width is less than or equal to 0.24um
Min GT width for NMOS channel length which has 45 degree bent on TO must be  >= 0.54um
Min GT width for PMOS channel length which has 45 degree bent on TO must be  >= 0.46um
Min GT width for channel length which has 45 degree bent on field oxide must be  >= 0.26um
GT must enter the TO region perpendicularly(horizontal or vertical direction).
90 degree bend on active region is not allowed
90 degree bend on active region is not allowed
Min space between poly interconnects with one or both poly width and length  are greater than 0.28um and 0.5um respectively must be  >= 0.22um
Min width must be  >= 0.356
Min space of SP must be  >= 0.356
Min SP space on STI  <= 0.42um must be merge
Min spacing of SP to a N+ active outside NW must be  >= 0.22
Min spacing of SP to a N+ pick-up active(non-butted active) must be >= 0.084um  if the distance between N+active and NW >= 0.43um
Min spacing of SP to a N+ pick-up active(non-butted active) must be >= 0.152um  if the distance between N+active and NW < 0.43um
Min overlap from SP edge to an active must be  >= 0.194um
Min overlap from SP edge to an active must be  >= 0.17um
Min extension of a SP region over P+active region must be  >= 0.152um
Min space of a SP edge to a N-channel poly gate must be  >= 0.238um
Min extension of a SP region to a P-channel poly gate must be  >= 0.4um

Min extension of a SP region beyond a P+ pick-up active must be  >= 0.152um  if the distance between P+active and NW  < 0.43um  1. To obey this rule and "e" simultaneously ,  the minimum space  between N+ pick-up active and P+ active should be increased to 0.304um

Min SP area  >= 0.4um2

Min SN width must be  >= 0.356
Min SN space must be  >= 0.356

Min enclosure of poly beyond contact must be  >=  0.07um
